LanguageData.RIS.LimitItems.Desc: Removes all items tagged with tech-level industrial
LanguageData.RIS.LimitResearch.Desc: Removes all research-projects tagged with tech-level industrial
LanguageData.RIS.LimitFactions.Desc: Removes all factions tagged with tech-level industrial
LanguageData.RIS.LimitPawnKinds.Desc: Removes all pawnkinds tagged with tech-level industrial
LanguageData.RIS.LogRemovals.Desc: Logs all removed items at game-start
LanguageData.RIS.RestartInfo: NOTE: Any changes require a restart to have effect
